channel.title: Baseline hazard on Missing Data Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Baseline hazard on Missing Data Solutions

item.title: Recalibration of the Cox model Baseline Hazard Function after Shrinkage
item.description: This post is about the offset procedure of the Cox model after shrinkage of the coefficients, followed by recalibration of the baseline hazard function. This seems straightforward to apply like with the logistic regression model but some caveats remain. These will be unraveled here.

item.title: Prediction Modeling with the Cox model - all about the baseline hazard
item.description: This post is about the internal and external validation of Cox regression models and how to adjust the baseline hazard function.

item.title: Prediction Modeling with the Cox model - all about the baseline hazard
item.description: This post is about different functions of the survival package, like basehaz, predict.coxph, survfit, termplot, what kind of results they provide and how they are calculated.
